title: Hidden Power
desc:
Post 2328
- All <:rgby:1107167371048788028> in your cards swap to different colors and gain new effects:
- <:red:1106234051129507932> -> <:inferno:1118594776716021780>, card may also be played if you have 5 or less cards.
- <:blue:1106234079055200378> -> ❄️, **Freeze** the next player if played, discard another card if discard.
- <:green:1106234108042031166> -> <:sprout:1118917438893985802>, card is automatically played for free once sprout turns are equal or higher than hand size.
- <:yellow:1106234135384699023> -> <:partisan:1107460550268559380>, you are immune to negative effects until the start of your next turn.
